name: Balloon Chase Journey
storyline: Two animals, Cherry Bear and Blink Fox, that lived in the green grassland have long dreamed of traveling around the world, but their traveling hot air balloon is stolen by unknown forces. In order to find back the hot air balloon and continue their traveling dreams, they set foot on the adventure for chasing hot air balloons. After crossing tropical island, harvest maple leaf farm and cold snow canyon, the hot air balloon was finally discovered. However, greater and unknown challenges were lying ahead.
summary: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.
